TextView.android:text: Create your own galaxy design by placing stars, connecting constellations, and drawing glowing Milky Way paths.

How to play:

• Move: drag to pan the sky safely

• Stars: tap to place stars
 Tap 2 stars to connect them

• Moon / Sun: tap to place them

• Tools → Marker: swipe to draw glowing Milky Way dust

• Tools → Eraser: swipe to erase marker dust

Controls:

• Undo: removes your last action

• Clear Object: removes ONLY Sun/Moon/Stars/Lines (keeps marker)

• Clear All: removes everything (marker + objects)

• Save (top-right): saves your design to Gallery
